oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-06-14 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 14, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer) with Tompall and the Glaser Brothers, guest performers Lonzo & Oscar, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 975th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Lonzo & Oscar; Del Wood; Marty Robbins; Glaser Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Marty Robbins introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Marty Robbins introduces Lonzo & Oscar -- Things Look Silly (Lonzo & Oscar) -- Marty Robbins introduces Del Wood -- Chinese Breakdown (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Marty Robbins announce his tour schedule -- Just Married (Marty Robbins, Glaser Brothers) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Marty Robbins) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Robbins, Marty; Tompall & the Glaser Brothers; Lonzo and Oscar
